Reviews.Title: “For those who want to stay near Sagrada Familia”
Reviews.Author: daisy2011
Reviews.Content: nice hotel short stay spent night satisfied location metro station close hospital de sant pau sagrada familia it’s convenient sagrada clean modern light bathroom facilities price reasonable paid 40 euros double night minus woman reception speak english understand hotel nice night stay barcelona recommend hotel centre

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable hotel for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: Paul S
Reviews.Content: hotel everest hospital sant pau quieter barcelona convenient metro short walk sagrada familia clean comfortable price hotel 6th floor elevator inexpensive stay short stay barcelona

Reviews.Title: “More a B&B (but without the Breakfast) than a Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Selloy
Reviews.Content: located near sant pau hospital hotel sleeping clean 2 people taking quick hot bath despite experience don’t expect luxuries it’s close ramblas de pretty avenue calm

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Everest
HotelInfo.Address: Trav. de Gracia 441, 08025 Barcelona, Spain
